description: This source file implements functions for managing HTTP CGI environment variable atoms, including creating code and name tables, and retrieving atom codes and names based on input identifiers. It defines functions for creating atom tables by name and ID, as well as functions to look up atom codes by name and names by code.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpAtoCgiEnvCreateCodeTable(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Initializes the atom table with CGI environment variable names and their corresponding codes by invoking AddAtomByName for each pair.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpAtoCgiEnvCreateNameTable(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Initializes the reverse atom table with CGI environment variable codes and their names by invoking AddAtomById for each pair.

methods.name: ULONG HttpAtoCgiEnvGetAtomCode(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * name)
methods.description: Retrieves the atom code for a given CGI environment variable name by searching the atom table via GetAtomByName.

methods.name: char * HttpAtoCgiEnvGetAtomName(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ULONG code)
methods.description: Retrieves the CGI environment variable name for a given atom code by searching the atom table via GetAtomById.
